page.title: 04Inside a house
page.content: My house is quite fashionable. In the living room we have a beige, woollen carpet, a brown dralon three-piece suite, a chipboard wall unit, a new hi-fi system (chipboard with sliding glass doors), and a colour television. We eat in the dining room. We have an oak table which usually seats six but can open out to fit sixteen around it. In the kitchen we have a microwave oven, a washing machine, a tumble drier a food mixer, an electric oven (with rings) and wall units of green melamine In my parents bedroom one wall has built-in, wooden wardrobes and drawers. There is a double bed. In my room I have a single bed and a fitted wardrobe My baby sister has a wooden cot and a changing unit in there too. My brother has a white cabin bed in his room with a desk and drawers underneath the bed. Our rooms are apricot,green and pink
